HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that navigates to the homepage.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Cart Icon
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Deals
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

elements.name: Shop now
elements.description: Button to shop the featured product.

assertions: Title contains 'Dyson India'
Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the Dyson logo

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This page displays Dyson's deals and product categories, showcasing their products and offers.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & Wet Cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair Care Link
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones products page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best Sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Page title contains 'Dyson India Official Website'
Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible
Element with text 'Shop now' is present
The text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI' is visible

DysonDealsPage.description: This page displays Dyson deals and promotions, allowing users to browse and purchase discounted products.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the main deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum and wet cleaners category.

elements.name: Cord-free Vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to the cord-free vacuums category.

elements.name: Corded vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to the corded vacuums category.

elements.name: Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the wet and dry vacuum cleaners category.

elements.name: Cart Icon
elements.description: Button to view the shopping cart.

assertions: Page title contains 'Deals and Offers | Dyson'
The 'Deals' link is visible.
The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible.

DysonHairCarePage.description: This page is the Dyson Hair Care landing page, showcasing various hair care products and related information.

elements.name: Hair Care Navigation Link
elements.description: Link to the main Hair Care section of the website.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Hair Stylers Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Stylers product category.

elements.name: Hair Dryers Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Dryers product category.

elements.name: Hair Straighteners Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Straighteners product category.

elements.name: Shop All Hair Care Link
elements.description: Link to view all hair care products.

elements.name: Gifts Link
elements.description: Link to the Gifts section.

elements.name: Cases, Accessories & Attachments Link
elements.description: Link to the Cases, Accessories & Attachments section.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

assertions: Page title contains 'Dyson Hair Care'
The 'Hair care' navigation link is visible
The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible
At least one hair care product category link is visible (e.g., 'Hair stylers', 'Hair dryers')

DysonAirTreatmentPage.description: This page is the Dyson Air Treatment landing page, specifically focusing on Air Purifiers. It allows users to explore and learn about Dyson's air purifier products.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifier section.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Air Purifiers
elements.description: Link to view all Air Purifiers.

elements.name: Purifier + Heaters
elements.description: Link to view Purifier + Heaters.

elements.name: Shop all air purifiers
elements.description: Link to view all air purifiers.

elements.name: Help me choose
elements.description: Link to Help me choose.

elements.name: Purifier filters
elements.description: Link to Purifier filters.

elements.name: Dyson air quality backpack research
elements.description: Link to Dyson air quality backpack research.

elements.name: Dyson Purifier Filter Research
elements.description: Link to Dyson Purifier Filter Research.

elements.name: Dyson Purifier Testing Standards
elements.description: Link to Dyson Purifier Testing Standards.

assertions: Verify the page title contains 'Dyson'
Verify the 'Air purifier' link is visible in the navigation bar
Verify the 'Search products and parts' search box is present
Verify the 'Air Purifiers' link is visible under 'Explore air purifier'
Verify the 'Purifier + Heaters' link is visible under 'Explore air purifier'
Verify the 'Shop all air purifiers' link is visible under 'Explore air purifier'

DysonHeadphonesPage.description: This page is the Dyson Headphones landing page, showcasing the OnTrac headphones and related accessories.

elements.name: Headphones Navigation Link
elements.description: Link to the Headphones category page.

elements.name: OnTrac Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac headphones product page.

elements.name: Ear cushions & caps Link
elements.description: Link to the Ear cushions & caps product page.

elements.name: Shop now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product details page.

elements.name: Search products and parts
elements.description: Search input field

elements.name: Close Reward Points Banner
elements.description: Button to close the reward points banner.

assertions: Page title contains 'Dyson Headphones'
Header text contains 'ontrac Headphones, remastered'
The 'Shop now' button is visible

DysonLightingPage.description: This page displays information about Dyson's lighting products. It allows users to explore different lighting options and learn about their features.

elements.name: Lighting Tab
elements.description: Link to the main lighting product page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Dyson Solarcycle Morph
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Solarcycle Morph product page.

elements.name: Shop lighting
elements.description: Link to the shop lighting page.

elements.name: Sure, I'll give feedback
elements.description: Button to provide feedback.

elements.name: No thanks
elements.description: Button to decline providing feedback.

elements.name: Close Reward Points Banner
elements.description: Button to close the reward points banner.

assertions: Page title contains 'Dyson Lighting'
Page contains the heading 'Lighting'
Page contains the text 'Dyson lighting is engineered for task performance with precise colour accuracy, daylight tracking and shadow reduction, ensuring accurate creative work is supported.'

UnknownPage.description: This is the Dyson Support page, which provides resources for troubleshooting, finding spare parts, and accessing user guides.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Solve a problem
elements.description: Link to the troubleshooting tool.

elements.name: Find the right part
elements.description: Link to find spare parts.

elements.name: Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.description: Link to user guides and software updates.

assertions: Page title contains 'Support'
Header text 'Dyson Support' is visible
Text 'Solve a problem, find spare parts and read expert tips and guides.' is visible
Text 'How can we help?' is visible
